item.description:
Announcing February’s Chai Tech Event:
Featuring Sam Zales on February 16th

We are excited to announce the first event of the New Year for The Chai Tech event: a free, monthly networking event for Jewish entrepreneurs and professionals in the technology industry.
Sam Zales is a leader in Boston's Hi-tech space and is currently the President of ZoomInfo (www.zoominfo.com)

Wednesday, February 16, 2011
6:30 - 8:30 p.m.
Lir, 903 Boylston St., Boston 02115
Cost: Free, just don't forget your business cards!

You MUST Register via this link: http://chaitechfeb.ev...

As President of ZoomInfo, Sam Zales is responsible for driving the company's operations and business strategy. With a proven track record for growing and maturing companies in challenging economic times, Zales brings 25 years of strategy, marketing, sales and product development experience with companies such as BuyerZone, American Express and Bain and Company to ZoomInfo.
In his previous role, Zales was the president and CEO of BuyerZone, the leading Internet marketplace for business purchasing. While at BuyerZone, he led the company from 2000 through its sale to Reed Business Information, a division of Reed Elsevier (NYSE: RUK), in January 2007 until November of 2008. He grew BuyerZone through the challenging environment of the dotcom bubble, to rapid revenue and profit growth by focusing the company's operating and marketing efforts to solidify BuyerZone market leadership position.

Note: Zoominfo is actively hiring!!


This networking opportunity is available to Jewish professionals of all ages and from all sectors of the high-tech community. Please join us!

For more information, please contact Brad at BradleyS@cjp.org or 617-457-8781.
Visit “CJP Technology Industry Group” on Facebook for more details!

Rachel Blankstein
Chai Tech Group Chair
item.name: February's Chai Tech Group Featuring Sam Zales, President of ZoomInfo
